text: @piersmorgan @DominicRaab Piers, there is a massive lack of PPE and a bravado attitude amongst management. My mum works in a care home and is now bed ridden with all the symptoms of #COVID19 the govs response to this is a joke and people refusing to question or hold them to account are equally as bad.
